questions.question: What product did Microsoft recently launch for Windows 11 PCs?
questions.explain: Microsoft's Xbox Copilot is designed to enhance gaming experiences on Windows 11 PCs.

questions.question: Which company claims to remove CO2 using less electricity than its competitors?
questions.explain: DACLab has announced its capability to remove CO2 more efficiently than many competitors.

questions.question: What concern did Satya Nadella express regarding Microsoft's future?
questions.explain: Satya Nadella expressed concerns about Microsoft's ability to thrive in the AI era.

questions.question: What major development is associated with Microsoft and Foxconn?
questions.explain: Microsoft is converting Foxconn's vacant buildings into a powerful AI data center.

questions.question: What was the key issue in the recent Anker product recall?
questions.explain: Anker's recall of over 481,000 power banks was due to fire hazard concerns.

questions.question: Which company recently launched Xbox Copilot for Windows 11 PCs?
questions.explain: Microsoft is the company behind the Xbox Copilot, which enhances gaming experiences on Windows 11.

questions.question: What environmental achievement did DACLab claim regarding CO2 removal?
choices: A. Uses more electricity than competitors
B. Removes CO2 using less electricity than many competitors
D. Requires no electricity at all
questions.explain: DACLab asserts it can remove CO2 with lower electricity consumption compared to several other companies in the field.

questions.question: Which film director recently commented on the creative nature of AI?
questions.explain: James Cameron noted that AI can be as creative as humans, but lacks a unique lived experience.

questions.question: What recent bill aims to block online adult content and VPNs?
questions.explain: The Internet Safety Bill aims to restrict access to online adult content and VPN services.

questions.question: What is Microsoft planning to do with Foxconn's empty buildings?
choices: A. Convert them into gaming centers
B. Turn them into the worldâ€™s most powerful AI data center
C. Use them for hardware manufacturing
D. Sell them for real estate
questions.explain: Microsoft intends to transform Foxconn's vacant buildings into a major AI data center.
